label_teim: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame 2010 Induction Ceremony Line Cut Clean Reel #100, 3/15/10
label_ssm: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame 2010 Induction Ceremony Line Cut Clean Reel #100, 3/15/10
summary_teim: Opening of the twenty fifth annual induction ceremony. Genesis, the Stooges, and David Geffen are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. Phish and the Stooges perform.
summary_ssm: Opening of the twenty fifth annual induction ceremony. Genesis, the Stooges, and David Geffen are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. Phish and the Stooges perform.
contents_teim: Opening remarks from Jann Wenner -- Phish performs Watcher of the skies -- Trey Anastasio inducts Genesis -- Genesis acceptance speeches -- Phish performs No reply at all -- Billy Joe Armstrong inducts the Stooges -- Stooges acceptance speeches -- Stooges perform Search and destroy; I wanna be your dog -- Jackson Browne inducts David Geffen -- David Geffen acceptance speech.
contents_ssm: Opening remarks from Jann Wenner -- Phish performs Watcher of the skies -- Trey Anastasio inducts Genesis -- Genesis acceptance speeches -- Phish performs No reply at all -- Billy Joe Armstrong inducts the Stooges -- Stooges acceptance speeches -- Stooges perform Search and destroy; I wanna be your dog -- Jackson Browne inducts David Geffen -- David Geffen acceptance speech.

abstract_ssm: This is part 1 of of footage of the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony from March 15, 2010. Introduction video montage -- Jann Wenner introductory remarks -- Fuse title cards -- Phish perform "Watcher of the Skies" -- Genesis video montage -- Trey Anastasio inducts Genesis -- Genesis acceptance speech -- Phish perform "No Reply At All" -- The Stooges video montage -- Billie Joe Armstrong inducts The Stooges -- The Stooges acceptance speech -- The Stooges and Billie Joe Armstrong perform "I Wanna Be Your Dog" -- David Geffen video montage -- Jackson Browne inducts David Geffen -- David Geffen acceptance speech --
